corpname.value: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

unittitle.value:
Abraham Lincoln Brigade and Spanish Civil War Photographs: Contact
        Sheets

p.value:
Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Tamiment Library & Robert F.
        Wagner Labor Archives for more information and to schedule an appointment,
        tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu or 212-998-2630.

Roughly 2,000 of the images can be identified (by the negative numbers in their margins) as
        being the work of photographer Harry Randall and his colleagues of the Fifteenth
        International Brigade Photo Unit. Other, unnumbered images may be by the Unit as well. Most
        of the images are of International Brigades activities and personnel, but some show general
        scenes of Spain and of the War, and some show the U.S. veterans on shipboard or in the
        U.S.
